topic.title: Qubes OS: A reasonably secure operating system
topic.body: I just started using Qubes OS. I like the idea, but why does good security have to be so difficult to use? Most of my friends and family would/could not use this OS daily.

1_1CKPXN6PimcbmYkqWzyfPSXqxHYqswgeri.body:
> [aiden](#comment_4_1GB5YpL2bL1qNx2tuQrzjh35HbZysivKtb): depends on what you mean by security

I think Qubes has the same problem as PGP.

1_1MwJSNBC1savftEvXQyoHcVLDgThtAPr6T.body: I think it is more likely this person wants to invest in a project that will turn a profit.
